title: How Perez won and Russell lost the Sakhir GP
description: A look at Sergio Perez's wild first F1 win and how George Russell had that victory cruelly snatched from him... twice.

itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: A look at Sergio Perez's wild first F1 win and how George Russell had that victory cruelly snatched from him... twice.
